channel.title: Region's Road
channel.description: Inspired by Ernie Pyle, Regions Road is a series of stories about the people whose lives intersect with mine along my road through life. They are tales about places, lives and things that live between point A and point B on our ever more hurried race down the road of life. These are stories of everyday folks who possess great strength and simple wisdom, who have dreams and live all the time of their lives. They are the unsung heroes, they are the heart and soul of America and we celebrate their lives on Regions Road.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Region's Road, tales of people and places along the road of life.
channel.itunes:summary: Inspired by Ernie Pyle, Regions Road is a series of stories about the people whose lives intersect with mine along my road through life. They are tales about places, lives and things that live between point A and point B on our ever more hurried race down the road of life. These are stories of everyday folks who possess great strength and simple wisdom, who have dreams and live all the time of their lives. They are the unsung heroes, they are the heart and soul of America and we celebrate their lives on Regions Road.

channel.itunes:keywords: Region's Road, Daniel Region, radio, broadcast, broadcaster, stories, writing, storytelling, From The Road, actor, director, columnist

item.title: 0102_Speak into the Mic
